about_the_game:
Money Run is a single-player arcade game that will submerge the player in the atmosphere of vintage noir, dark humour, gangsters and corruption.

Get yourself behind the wheel and lead your way through the action 2D driving game.
Pick a car, pick weapons and follow the story of Frank Dunn-Kruger living the life of a desparate man trying to do best for his family.
Frank's story is told in a great comic book style.
The Great Depression hits many major US cities. The Gangston is no exception.

Cosy and careless living is no more for many commoners. Banks are eager to cash out housing loans or force a foreclosure in pursuit of greater profit. Along with employment catastrophe, criminal activity is on the rise with many gangster syndicates forming up.

Caught up in the middle of events, Frank Dunn-Kruger, a common cab driver, is trying to keep his house and family safe by clinging to any chance of earning a little extra cash with what he seems to do best - driving. Will he be able to pull through the ordeal and potholes on the road is completely in your power.

name: Money Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-330M 2.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator HD
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
